Experience

Education, Employment and Volunteering

Previous page Next page

Education

Doctor of Philosophy, Climate Science, University of Melbourne (2012-2016)

Bachelor of Science (Honours), Atmospheric and Ocean Science, University of Melbourne (2007-2009)

Bachelor of Physiotherapy (Honours), LaTrobe University (2003-2006)

Employment

Full-time

Postdoctoral Research Associate, Climate Change Research Centre, University of New South Wales (2019-present)

Postdoctoral Research Fellow, CSIRO Oceans and Atmosphere (2016-2019)

Climate Projections Scientist, CSIRO Marine and Atmospheric Research (2009-2012)

  • Developed regional climate change projections for the Australian Climate Change Science Program and Pacific Climate Change Science Program

Part-time while studying

Research Community Coordinator, Research Platform Services (2013-2015)

  • Taught computer programming courses to university staff and students
  • Coordinated and supported the growth of The Carpentries community in Melbourne and Australia more broadly

Scientific programmer, CSIRO Oceans and Atmosphere (May 2015)

  • Developed the core oceanographic data analysis functionality within the Climate and Weather Science Laboratory workflow tool

Tutor, School of Earth Sciences, University of Melbourne (2012-2013)

  • Demonstrated in 2nd and 3rd year undergraduate atmospheric and ocean science classes

Volunteering

Australian Meteorological and Oceanographic Society

  • Communications Coordinator (2017-present)
  • Tasmania Secretary (2017-present)
  • National Secretary (2011-2017)
  • Melbourne Centre Chair (2012)

The Carpentries

  • Regional Coordinator for Australia (2014-present)
  • Qualified Instructor (2013-present)
    • Lead instructor at more than 30 workshops (see a video recording)
  • Member of the interim Board of the Software Carpentry Foundation (2014-2015)

Research Bazaar

  • Global coordinator (2015-present)

Tasmanian Greens

  • Election Coordinator (2018-present)
  • Convenor, Denison Branch (2016-2018)

Journal of Open Research Software

  • Associate Editor (2016-present)

CSIRO Staff Association

  • Acting Section Councillor for Tasmania (2018)
  • Workplace Delegate (2017-2019)
